channel.title: Start Message
channel.description:
Hey :) Its Saletana
My question is where can i change the start message in my server? I downloaded Pk Planted client and sources. I already changed theme picture to mine and so on... now where can i change this start message? In the sources?

item.title: Start Message
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“RuneLive, post:4, topic:364540”]^ L, so true.

On topic, what base are you using?

On Project Insanity you have to go to “Config.class”
And change the name there.

On the most sources you have to go to “Client.java”
And search for “welcome to” and change it there.

Hope it worked.[/quote]

Wrong, it’s not in config.CLASS. It’s located in client.Java along with config.Java

Client.Java -

sendMessage("<col=132>Welcome to YourName");

Config.Java

public static final String WELCOME_MESSAGE = "Download client at: REMOVED";

EDIT; Config.Java isn’t needed to be changed.

Read full topic

item.title: Start Message
item.dc:creator: @RuneLive RuneLive
item.description:
@RuneLive wrote:

^ L, so true.

On topic, what base are you using?

On Project Insanity you have to go to “Config.class”
And change the name there.

On the most sources you have to go to “Client.java”
And search for “welcome to” and change it there.

Hope it worked.

Read full topic

item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Youre a fagget, learn some coding, then come to us.

You’re the faggot.

Everyone has to start somewhere, and Saletana is obviously new to this sort of thing, so give him a fucking break and help him; don’t criticize him just because he’s asking for help.
